boxingrandom.heroParagraph: Boxing Random drops you into a wobbly boxing ring where one clean hit can flip the match. Time your lunges, watch the weather twists, and swing smarter than your rival.
instructions: Every round in Boxing Random throws a new arena twist at you—from icy floors to gravity-flipping rings—so stay light on your feet and watch your opponent’s balance before committing to a punch.
Feint with small hops to bait a swing, then unleash a straight punch or the infamous surprise kick when the distance is perfect. Remember: flying wildly often leaves you wide open for a counter.
Use the first seconds of each bout to read the round’s gimmick, then lean into short combos instead of button mashing. Precision beats chaos when the bell rings for overtime.

sections.heading: Control the stumble
sections.body: Mini hops reset your balance. Tap forward to close distance, then stop tapping before you swing so your fighter doesn’t tumble over its own gloves.

sections.heading: Capitalize on arena quirks
sections.body: Snowy stages reward patient taps while windy rounds push punches farther. Adjust your rhythm to whatever wacky modifier the RNG dial spins up.

sections.heading: Bring a friend
sections.body: Boxing Random shines in couch co-op. Trade controllers between rounds or pass a keyboard and see who adapts fastest to the next absurd arena rule.

basketballstars.heroParagraph: Basketball Stars lets you lace up against AI or friends in highlight-reel duels. Break ankles with crossovers, pick your power-ups, and drain shots before the buzzer sounds.
instructions: Choose from classic duos or custom avatars, then learn your player’s special. Some dominate the rim while others rain threes—lean into their strengths as soon as the tip-off lands.
On offense, use hesitations to freeze defenders before pulling up or cutting baseline. On defense, time the steal button carefully; misfires set up wide-open threes.
Collect cash mid-match to upgrade stats between tournaments. A balanced build with stamina and shooting keeps you deadly deep into championship play.

sections.heading: Master power-ups
sections.body: Turbo boosts help you beat defenders down the court, while the megadunk shatters any attempt at a block. Trigger them when the shot clock dips under eight seconds.

sections.heading: Guard the arc
sections.body: A well-timed jump can stuff even the tallest shooter. Watch the opponent’s release animation and contest at its peak to force bricks.

sections.heading: Challenge friends

baldi-plus.heroParagraph: Baldi's Basics Plus cranks the cult-classic schoolhouse escape into a sprawling roguelike. New layouts, smarter faculty, and surprise events keep every run tense, hilarious, and absolutely unpredictable.
instructions: Listen for Baldi's ruler and plan your routes before you sprint. Each floor is generated on the fly, so mark safe corridors mentally and grab items that counter every teacher.
Answer notebooks carefully—wrong answers speed Baldi up—but don’t waste time. Prioritize keys and sodas that open shortcuts or push pursuers out of the way.
Pay attention to random events. Flooded hallways, power outages, or surprise assemblies can change your strategy instantly, so always keep an emergency item in reserve.

sections.heading: Decode every faculty member
sections.body: Baldi isn't alone. Principal of the Thing nabs you for running, Mrs. Pomp eats time with pop quizzes, and Beans blocks halls with gum. Learn their audio cues and keep counters like safety scissors handy.

sections.heading: Master the random events
sections.body: Plus Mode introduces daily modifiers—darkness, slippery floors, or surprise guests. Check the chalkboard before each run so you're not caught off guard when Baldi changes the rules mid-lesson.

sections.heading: Speedrun the elevators
sections.body: You only escape by banking enough notebooks to unlock the elevator. Route efficiently, save stamina for the final chase, and stash a B-Soda to knock Baldi back just before the doors close.
